title: Selection of Valid Inputs from Three Inputs
description: F_TO_PT converts a frequency value of Hz in the corresponding period.
name: SEL2_OF_3

input.name: D
input.description: The tolerance value to determine the validity of inputs.

output.name: Y
output.description: The calculated average of the selected valid input values.

output.name: W
output.description: Indicator of which inputs were valid (0 for all, 1 for IN2 and IN3, 2 for IN3 and IN1, 3 for IN1 and IN2, 4 for none).

output.name: E
output.description: Error flag indicating if no valid input combinations were found.
